pl.polsl.lab6.pawel.salicki.webServices

Class ManageContainerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.lab6.pawel.salicki.webServices.ManageContainerService

  • public class ManageContainerService
extends java.lang.Object
    WebService managing the database container and JPA database. Returns the appropriate values to the client.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pawe≈Ç Salicki

      • addHostPlayer

        public void addHostPlayer(java.lang.String playerHostName,
                          int playerHostGoals,
                          int playerHostEnteredMinute,
                          int playerHostLeftMinute,
                          int playerHostYellowCards,
                          int playerHostFouls,
                          int matchLength,
                          int playerHostRedCards)
        The method adds a player to the host team (to the JPA database and container)
        Parameters:
        playerHostName - name of player
        playerHostGoals - amout of goals
        playerHostEnteredMinute - minute entered on match
        playerHostLeftMinute - minute left from match
        playerHostYellowCards - amount of yellow cards
        playerHostFouls - amount of fouls
        matchLength - length of the game by the player
        playerHostRedCards - if the player got a red card

        public void readMatchFromFileDatabase()

                                      javax.transaction.SystemException,
                                      javax.transaction.RollbackException,

                                      javax.transaction.HeuristicRollbackException
